price: 15. Ni-aayoota (Qhuraan kinnuk) kaal tankirriyime waqdi, ah naharsi marih hayyayyoona iyya anqasah.
arabic: إِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: idhā tut'lā ʿalayhi āyātunā qāla asāṭīru al-awalīna
